text: eyata maryamge put isa “apage deviyane! ahasin ek bandesiyak oba apata pahala karanu mænava! apatada, apa idiriye sitina ayatada, apagen pasu pæminennantada (medina) ek alut avurudu dinayak bavatada, obage (balamahimayata) ek sadhakayak bavatada tikhenu æta. ebævin (esema) apatada ahara laba denu mænava! oba nam ahara laba dimehi itamat sresthaya” yayi (prarthana kara) kiveya
